meta.name: description
meta.content: Be part of innovation of automotive industry co-creating technological solution with an experienced partner as Marelli enpowering automakers.
Be part of innovation of automotive industry co-creating technological solution with an experienced partner as Marelli enpowering automakers.

svg.alt: Stylized white M, with the word Marelli underneath

p.span: Discover our portfolio of advanced technologies born to differentiate the vehicles of the future.
Discover how we can enable continuous innovation for the future of mobility.
Transforming the future of mobility through co-creation with customers, suppliers and partners.
As we change the future of mobility, we are contributing to a more sustainable world.
Stay updated on our fast-changing world, find the latest updates and news about Marelli.

svg.alt: Stylized white M, with the word Marelli underneath

p.span: Discover our portfolio of advanced technologies born to differentiate the vehicles of the future.

button.aria-label: Back to Technology and Products submenu

p.span: Discover how we can enable continuous innovation for the future of mobility.
Transforming the future of mobility through co-creation with customers, suppliers and partners.
As we change the future of mobility, we are contributing to a more sustainable world.
Stay updated on our fast-changing world, find the latest updates and news about Marelli.

div.video: Your browser does not support HTML video.
Your browser does not support HTML video.

div.h3: Marelli wins SAA Innovations in Lightweighting Award for its pioneering LeanExhaust platform
Marelli awarded for its new front axle for electric racing vehicles at the Professional MotorSport World Expo 2025

h3.span: Amidst the automotive industry’s most significant transformation in history, Marelli prioritizes innovation and speed.

div.p: This allow us to deliver cutting-edge technology that will shape the vehicles of the future. With a focus on collaboration and consumer-based thinking, our advanced solutions empower automakers to deliver customized driving experiences tailored to individual preferences and lifestyles.

img.alt: Engineer, Scientists and Developers Gathered Around Illuminated Conference Table in Technology Research Center, Talking, Finding Solution and Analysing Industrial Engine Design. Close-up Hands Shot; Shutterstock ID 1682713573; purchase_order: -; job: -; client: -; other: -
img.title: carousel_cover

div.h3: Co-Creation is the engagement model we foster with our customers, suppliers, and leading technology partners. It drives innovation, resiliency, sustainability, and actionable insights to produce tangible business results.

div.p: We work hand-in-hand with customers, suppliers, and partners from the earliest stages to inform future developments.
Design-Led experiences and digital tools facilitate Co-Creation, leveraging technology from Marelli's portfolio.
Success is rooted in roadmap alignment, uncovering synergies that promote joint value creation.

div.h2: The next automotive revolution is here.

div.h3: The next automotive revolution is here.

span.span: Marelli enables the Software-Defined Vehicle by providing automakers with powerful platforms and tools to customize their vehicle architecture.

div.video: Your browser does not support HTML video.
Your browser does not support HTML video.

div.h3: Our lighting, interiors, and electronics technologies facilitate complete vehicle personalization.

p.span: Leveraging state-of-the-art light design, interactive displays, smart surfaces, and more, we give automakers the ability to create unique brand signatures, using components that are modular, configurable, and cost-effective.

div.video: Your browser does not support HTML video.
Your browser does not support HTML video.

div.h3: No matter the road, our destination is within reach: sustainable energy management.

p.span: With our propulsion, exhaust, thermal, and chassis solutions, we help automakers’ transition to sustainable mobility, enhancing safety, comfort, and agility while reducing environmental impact.

span.span:
Our way to a more
sustainable world

img.alt: Aerial view of road between green summer forest and blue lake in Finland; Shutterstock ID 1445931623; purchase_order: -; job: -; client: -; other: -
img.title: Focus Data Key - Cover.jpg

div.h3: Our commitment to sustainability remains steadfast, embedded in new products, processes and risk reduction strategies.

p.span: Rather than just navigating market disruptions, we used them to drive our operational and quality excellence and deepen our co-creation with our customers and partners.With a strong foundation in place, we are advancing our 2025 priorities.”

div.p: of the electricity used at our manufacturing sites
are aligned with Design for Sustainability criteria

div.h2: From tech to track and from track to success

div.h3: More than 100 years of predominant presence in the racing world at your fingertips.

div.p: Marelli Motorsport serves as an accelerator for technology development, enabling the flow down to the passenger car business, leveraging our agile, fast, and optimized design model.

img.alt: Software Developer, Project Manager and Machinery Operators Collaborate on a Prototype Turbine Engine, Standing with Laptop Computer in Scientific Technology Lab. Team Developing a New Electric Motor

div.h2: Our people: boosting passion, know-how and innovation

div.h3: Join our team and help us to create a safer, greener and better-connected world by shaping the future of mobility.

div.p: At Marelli you are part of an inclusive and diverse team with a global perspective.
Every employee is empowered to take action and make decisions at the right level.
We work with passion and energy, all acting as owners of a $10 billion startup.
We believe when people with different perspectives work together, better results are achieved.

span.span:
We move fast.
Follow us on LinkedIn.

div.p: This website uses technologies such as cookies to analyze and improve our website to give you the best experience possible. Click to accept or to refuse the use of this technology on our site.
Please click at Cookie Policy if you want further information and setting options.
